name: Veracode
description: Upload an application to the Veracode Platform for security testing.
author: Veracode

inputs.name: ConnectionDetailsSelection
inputs.label: Select Connection Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the connection source for connecting to Veracode or enter your Veracode API credentials.

inputs.name: AnalysisService
inputs.label: Select Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a service connection or click Manage to create a service connection.

inputs.name: apiId
inputs.label: API ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter your Veracode API ID. For instructions on generating your API credentials, go to the Veracode Help Center and search for "Generate Veracode API Credentials".

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter your Veracode API key. For instructions on generating your API credentials, go to the Veracode Help Center and search for "Generate Veracode API Credentials".

inputs.name: veracodeAppProfile
inputs.label: Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the name of the application profile from the Veracode Platform.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Scan Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the name of the new or updated scan.

inputs.name: filepath
inputs.label: Filepath
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the filepath or folderpath of the file or directory to upload.

inputs.name: sandboxName
inputs.label: Sandbox Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you want to perform a sandbox scan of the application, enter the name of the sandbox.

inputs.name: createSandBox
inputs.label: Create Sandbox
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option if you want to create a new sandbox for this application.

inputs.name: optargs
inputs.label: Optional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter any optional arguments to pass to the Veracode API wrapper.

inputs.name: createProfile
inputs.label: Create Application Profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option if you want to create a new Veracode application profile for this application.

inputs.name: failBuildIfUploadAndScanBuildStepFails
inputs.label: Fail build if Upload and Scan build step fails
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to fail the build if the Upload and Scan build step fails. If not selected and the Upload and Scan build step fails, the build continues.

inputs.name: importResults
inputs.label: Import Results upon Scan Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create scan summary information at the end of the scan. This option delays the build until the application scan is complete.

inputs.name: failBuildOnPolicyFail
inputs.label: Fail build if application fails security policy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to fail the build if the application fails its security policy. If not selected and the application fails its security policy, the build continues.

inputs.name: maximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Fail build if no scan results within (in minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The minimum value is 30. The maximum value is 1440 (24 hours). This option only applies if either of the Veracode Scan Results options are selected.
